home.transform_title: A New Way to Learn Math
home.transform_desc: ShapeSpeak is a fun learning set for kids aged 2‚Äì4, including those with visual impairments. It combines smart shape recognition and creative play.
home.mission_text: ‚ÄúTo open the door to exploring math ‚Äì the first step in building knowledge for every child.‚Äù
home.objectives_text: To design creative math learning tools that contribute to a well-rounded and engaging early education. At the same time, we aim to ensure a sustainable revenue stream that supports long-term business growth.
home.features_desc: ShapeSpeak helps kids learn math easily through multi-sensory play.
home.feature_1_desc: Each piece has a special shape and color. When placed on the base, the camera sees it and plays sounds to help kids recognize shapes.
home.feature_2_desc: Kids combine shapes to make objects, triggering fun stories about math and geometry.
home.feature_3_desc: Special textures and sound feedback help children with visual impairments learn just as well as others.
home.feature_5_desc: Supports logical thinking, shape recognition, and problem-solving through hands-on play.
home.feature_6_desc: Fun, eye-catching colors spark interest and make learning more exciting for young children.
home.tech_intro: ShapeSpeak uses a camera from above and smart AI to help kids learn through sight, touch, and sound.
home.tech_point1: When kids place a shape on the base, the camera scans it and says the name in both English and Vietnamese.
home.tech_point2: When kids build objects with shapes, the system gives encouraging sounds and tells fun math stories.
home.tech_point3: The camera is placed 24cm above the base to clearly see everything.
home.tech_point4: Textured pieces and sound help children with visual impairments learn independently.
home.impact_desc: ShapeSpeak supports children‚Äôs early development in meaningful ways
home.impact_box1_desc: Focuses on the key time when young minds are ready to understand math basics
home.impact_box2_desc: Designed to be effective for both sighted and visually impaired children
home.impact_box3_desc: Multi-sensory play keeps kids interested and helps them remember better than traditional methods
home.vision_desc: To become one of the trusted creators of early childhood learning products, offering a joyful, fair, and creative learning environment where every child has the chance to grow and shine in their own way.
home.roadmap_item1: More fun stories and building sets to explore.
home.roadmap_item2: Add multi-language support for global learners
home.roadmap_item3: Use smart tech to adapt learning to each child
home.roadmap_item4: Work with schools to bring ShapeSpeak into classrooms
home.core1_desc: We keep inventing new ways to make learning better for kids
home.core2_desc: We design for all children, no matter their abilities
home.core3_desc: Learning should be fun, exciting, and spark curiosity
home.core4_desc: We help kids stay curious and ready to explore new ideas
home.expert_quote: "ShapeSpeak is a big step forward in early math learning. By blending touch, sound, and visuals, it helps more children learn in ways that work for them ‚Äî especially those who need extra support."
